title: Hybrid Collaborative Design Curriculum: Language Domain-Centered Practical Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Design Principles and Linguistics
context.additional_context: Asynchronous collaborative learning operated in a smartphone-based LMS environment, enhancing practical skills through language design projects (e.g., multilingual interfaces, typography systems)

learning_goals: Learners plan and execute language design projects using online collaboration tools.
Learners propose multilingual design solutions reflecting cultural contexts.
Learners improve collaborative design outputs through LMS-based peer review.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
